title: Pizzeria Client
description: The front-end of the MERN stack pizza ordering app is built with React, providing a responsive and user-friendly interface. Users can effortlessly browse pizza options and seamlessly place their order for desired pizzas. Real-time updates enhance the ordering experience, ensuring a smooth and engaging interface.

title: Pizzeria Server
description: The back-end of the MERN stack pizza ordering app is powered by Node.js and Express.js. It efficiently handles server-side logic, Leveraging MongoDB for data storage, the back-end ensures fast and reliable performance, enabling seamless communication between the front-end and database for a smooth pizza ordering process.

title: Custom Castle
description: Custom Castle is a house rental management web portal developed on XAMPP stack. It provides a comprehensive solution for managing house rentals. Users can easily search and view available properties and submit rental applications. The system efficiently handles data storage, processing, and user interactions, streamlining the rental management process.
